Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to surcharges for the installation or use of certain appliances in housing accommodations subject to rent control
Summary: Prohibits the imposition of any surcharge for the installation or use of a tenant-installed appliance where the tenant pays for electric utility service.
LawCode: Add ยง26-416-a, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to surcharges for the installation or use of certain appliances in housing accommodations subject to rent control
